branchCategory.name: IT
branchCategory.description: <p>Electro-pneumatic regulator series IT has a variation for each output flow rate. In addition to the existing conduit entry, a DIN connector is available. A dedicated exhaust port (M5) is installed to remove air from the nozzle. The IT series comes with monitor signal output and shock/ vibration resistance.</p>

branchItem.name: IT*0**, Electro-Pneumatic Regulator, Metric
